definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.chinese: 飛機不會伴隨著岳家親戚。

definition: learned person/expert in a certain field/abbr. for 大方之家[da4 fang1 zhi1 jia1]
the Zhou family (household, firm etc)/Jow-Ga Kung Fu - Martial Art
the Hong family (household)/Hung Gar Kung Fu - Martial Art
a member of the same clan/a distant relative with the same family name
relatives/members of the same family, clan, tribe etc
the Korean Yi or Lee Dynasty (1392-1910)
(neologism 2015) the Zhao family (derogatory term for those who hold power in the PRC)
